text: Hum ney musa (alh-e-salam) ki maa ko wahee ki kay issay doodh pilati reh aur jab tujhay iss ki nisbat koi khof maloom hoto issay darya mein baha dena aur koi darr khof ya ranj ghum na kerna hum yaqeenan issay tumhari taraf lotaney walay hain aur issay apnay payghumbaron mein bananey walay hain
